The Main class.

Call this class to run the project.

Example Usage: java Main ensemble.csv 1

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

The main method which read's in the CSV_FILE_PATH and MPRS_NUMBER as parameters from the command line, and then run's the SnakeSimulator to determine the maximum length song.

Parameters:
args - The arguments provided should be CSV_FILE_PATH MPRS_NUMBER
Throws:
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - NOT ENOUGH PARAMATERS PROVIDED

runSimulator

public static void runSimulator(java.lang.String csvFilePath,
                                int MPRS)

Run's the snake simulator to find the maximum MPRS-length song

Parameters:
csvFilePath - The path to the CSV file containing the snakes
MPRS - the maximum repeats per snake
See Also:
SnakeSimulator

readSnakesFromCSV

public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Snake> readSnakesFromCSV(java.lang.String csvFilePath)

Reads the CSV file and returns a HashMap of snakes, where each Snake is mapped against the line it appeared in the file.

Parameters:
csvFilePath - The path to the CSV file containing the snakes
Returns:
A HashMap of snakes, where each Snake is mapped against the line it appeared in the file.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - FAILED TO LOCATE FILE
java.io.IOException - FAILED TO READ FROM FILE
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - INVALID CSV FILE: ARRAY OUT OF BOUNDS.. ENSURE EACH LINE IN YOUR CSV FILE MATCHES THE FOLLOWING FORMAT: SNAKE_NAME, TAIL_ID, HEAD_ID
